segments.text: Good morning , my name is Martin . You've applied for the Laboratory Assistant's position , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . When I saw the advertisement I thought it would really suit me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me why you replied to our advertisement ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that I'll be really good at this kind of work . In fact I learn so fast that I'll be looking for promotion very shortly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know exactly what you would be doing as a Laboratory Assistant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A laboratory assistant helps to maintain scientific equipment , keep a check on the supplies in the store , and prepare the chemicals for experiments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What sort of student do you regard yourself as ? Did you enjoy studying while you were at school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suppose I'm a reasonable student . I passed all my tests and enjoyed studying subjects that interested me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What were your favorite subjects at school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maths and chemistry were my favorite subjects at school . I also enjoyed history .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any plans for further study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I've thought about doing the part-time Chemistry Certificate course at Technical College . I think I would really benefit from doing that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever had a job before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have worked part-time at a take away food store-the one just round the corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a lot of other applicants for this position . Why do you think that you deserve to get the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I've found out a lot about this type of work and my research suggests that I would be quite capable of doing the work involved . I also think that I would be able to handle any training course reasonably well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I have asked you everything I wanted to . Thank you for coming along to the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . When will I know if I am successful ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll be in touch with you by telephone or by mail within a week . Well . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S2
